message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could work towards a mutually agreeable price. Considering the value this product holds for you, I propose an initial offer of $1,300,000. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I agree the product is valuable, that price is a little high for me. I'd be willing to purchase the product for $1,050,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. In light of our discussion, I would like to refine my proposal. I am willing to consider $1,150,000 as a more reasonable starting point for this transaction. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining accessible for you. Please let me know if this suggestion is something you would be interested in considering.
I appreciate you working with me on this, Alice.  To be honest, $1,150,000 is still a bit outside my budget.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1,100,000?

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm glad we're finding common ground here. In order to reach a satisfactory agreement, I propose a price of $1,125,000 for the product. This is a middle ground between our previous offers, aiming to respect the value of the product while making it more accessible for you. I hope this revised offer will be acceptable to you.
